titles.title: A bill to require that a three-year supply of anthracite coal be acquired for the National Defense Stockpile.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Seapower and Strategic and Critical Materials.

committee.subcommittee: Seapower and Strategic and Critical Materials
committee.name: House Armed Services

bill.summary: 2/24/1987--Introduced. Directs the President to include anthracite coal as a strategic and critical material under the Strategic and Critical Materials Stock Piling Act and to acquire a three-year supply of U.S. produced anthracite coal for the National Defense Stockpile. Authorizes appropriations.
